name: bulba
title: pokemon
text: bulbazor will eat you for breakfast. bulbazor is one with nature. He is also strong, polite, and calm - the ultimate pokemon!

name: pika
title: pokemon
text: Pikachu can shoot lightning, so be careful and don't mess with him!

name: squirrel
title: pokemon
text: Squirrel likes water. He is a tricky one, once he was a gangsta - now he is more than that!

name: Mheow
title: pokemon
text: Mheow can talk - this is a knife with two edges, better find another pokemon and leave this one to team Rocket!
